abstract: Citigroup wrapped up its bid to take over the scandal-tainted broker Nikko Cordial on Thursday in a buyout valued at up to $13.35 billion, which would make it the biggest foreign takeover of a Japanese company.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup wrapped up its bid to take over the scandal-tainted broker Nikko Cordial on Thursday in a buyout valued at up to $13.35 billion, which would make it the biggest foreign takeover of a Japanese company.

headline.main: Citigroup’s Offer for Nikko Shares Expires
